articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Australian and his dog rescued after 3 months adrift in Pacific - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Sydney resident Timothy Lyndsay Shaddock, 54, and dog Bella rescued 1,900km from land by the crew of Mexican tuna boat.
articles.content:
An Australian sailor who had been adrift at sea with his dog for three months has been rescued by a Mexican tuna boat in international waters, the fishing vessels owner said.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (2) and black Ear (2) are now available - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Open sales of the new phone have begun in North America, Europe and Australia, it's still on pre-order in South America and most of the Asian-Pacific region.
articles.content:
The Nothing Phone (2) is now available in Europe, North and Central America, along with certain other regions. Joining the new phone are the Nothing Ear (2) buds in the new black color.
